name: Discourse Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Discourse Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Discourse API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Discourse API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: post

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 作用: Choose an operation | 默认值: add | (必填项)
available_options: Add (值: add) - Create a user to group
Remove (值: remove) - Remove user from group

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the user to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the user to create | (必填项)

color.name: color
color.natural_language_description: 参数名: Color | 作用: Color of the category | 默认值: 0000FF | (必填项)

textColor.name: textColor
textColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Color | 作用: Text color of the category | 默认值: 0000FF | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category ID | 作用: ID of the category | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: ID of the group to remove
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group ID | 作用: ID of the group to remove | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the post

content.name: content
content.description: Content of the post. HTML is supported.
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Content of the post. HTML is supported. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

postId.name: postId
postId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post ID | 作用: ID of the post | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: Email of the user to create
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email of the user to create | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.description: The username of the user to return
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: The username of the user to return | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.description: The password of the user to create
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: The password of the user to create | (必填项)

by.name: by
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 作用: What to search by | 默认值: username | (必填项)

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.natural_language_description: 参数名: SSO External ID | 作用: Discourse SSO external ID | (必填项)

flag.name: flag
flag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Flag | 作用: User flags to search for

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: asc (值: None) - Whether to sort ascending
order (值: None) - What to order by
showEmails (值: None) - Whether to include user email addresses
stats (值: None) - Whether to return user stats

usernames.name: usernames
usernames.description: Usernames to remove from group. Multiples can be defined separated by comma.
usernames.natural_language_description: 参数名: Usernames | 作用: Usernames to remove from group. Multiples can be defined separated by comma. | (必填项)
